examples: They find it threatening, but it is very convincing.
Lo encuentran amenazante, pero es muy convincente.
The future we created for you should have been convincing.
El futuro que creamos para ti debería haber sido convincente.
And unless she's wearing a very convincing disguise.
Y a menos que lleve un disfraz muy convincente.
They think you're smart and convincing.
Piensan que eres inteligente y convincente.
